hints.content:
This number line shows $\tealD{9}$ jumps of $\goldE{5}$ units each.

![A number line labeled 0, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45. Arrows labeled, plus 5, point right from each number to the next. A brace labeled, 9 equal jumps, spans all 9 arrows.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8b3183c1d3750d448ceed612e88ce350fdc3dcaa)

It starts at $0$ and ends at $45$.

We can also reach $45$ using $\goldE{5}$ jumps of $\tealD{9}$ units each.

![A number line labeled 0, 9, 18, 27, 36, 45. Arrows labeled, plus 9, point right from each number to the next. A brace labeled, 5 equal jumps, spans all 5 arrows.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7fe2433423618920574a0098ecb364c83d82f5b3)

[[☃ explanation 1]]

These pictures could represent $9\times 5$:

![A number line labeled 0, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45. Arrows point right from each number to the next.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/873441367ebd0c7347a1fa0f98e81e27a2abd14b)

![A number line labeled 0, 9, 18, 27, 36, 45. Arrows point right from each number to the next.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d4a1c2ce1adbff75e479d14bd6a5578a13220c10)

question.content:
**Which $2$ number lines could we use to represent $9 \times 5$ ?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 0, 6, 12, 18, 24, 30. Arrows point right from each number to the next.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3d1f97919369355bf71e79112b942a1c7b4d911b)
![A number line labeled 0, 9, 18, 27, 36, 45. Arrows point right from each number to the next.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/d4a1c2ce1adbff75e479d14bd6a5578a13220c10)
![A number line labeled 0, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35. Arrows point right from each number to the next.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/fc58b8d9d090f86c77177ee10567860116639bd2)

![A number line labeled 0, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45. Arrows point right from each number to the next.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/873441367ebd0c7347a1fa0f98e81e27a2abd14b)
